name: Dungeons and Butter Goblins
blurb: An indie RPG dungeon crawler for iPhone. Leveling up, exploring, humor, and saving the day sums it up. It is an amazing adventure!

rewards.reward: Squire Level: Now we're talking, thanks for supporting us. By pledging you have earned a signed KickStarter Monster sheet, an assortment of monster concept PDFs, and a letter of thanks from us personally (within U.S. only but if you still want to pledge this level we will send you a personal email instead.) (All Pledges receive a copy of the game.)

Runesmith Level: Hot iron and fire bend to your will. You create great weapons of power and spells beyond compare are within your grasp. By pledging this level we will work with you to create a weapon or magic of your choice for the game. Giant Mace. Firebolt. Dragon spear? Anything you can think of we can make happen (within reason.) Let your imagination wonder! and ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS!

Monster Hunter Level: This is a cool one. Ever wanted to see a monster in game that you imagined? Well why not put your money where your mouth is? We will work with you to make your very own monster in game (as long as it is reasonable and appropriate we will make it happen.) and ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS!

LoreKeeper Level: Stories of knights and dragons have been told since times of old. You recall many great things and wish to tell others. By pledging this level you will get to work with us to make a random encounter scenario. This means the art, story/dialogue, and what is done to the player is all up to you! Let your imagination go wild! (Within reason of course.) and ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS!

Flag Bearer Level: You are the one to represent the game to the world! By pledging this level you will get a Limited Addition Dungeons and Butter Goblins T-shirt. Be quick because they are limited in quantity! and ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS up to LoreKeeper Level!

Iconic Character Level: Friend or Foe? By pledging this level you will get to work with the team to make your very own character who appears throughout the story to help or hamper the hero. You will decide his/her art, personality, ambitions, role in story, and ect. (within reason.) and ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS up to LoreKeeper Level!

Dungeon Master Level: Ever wanted to be the bad guy? Well here is your chance! By pledging this level you will get to make your own dungeon with us. You will make the story, look of the dungeon, a Boss monster, and 5 monsters! (P.S. we will also populate the dungeon with more monsters but due to time we will take those from ones we will be making for other tier levels but we will work with you on it.) and ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS up to LoreKeeper Level!

Mentor Level: Wise and well trained you are. By pledging this level you get to make our hero's mentor and person who introduces him to the world. We will work with you on the art, personality, and his role throughout the story of our character. (all ideas must be within reason.) and ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS up to LoreKeeper Level!

LoreMaster Level: Legends of feats beyond comparison and dark times fill your mind. Stories are in your blood. By pledging this level you will get to work with us to make 5 random encounter scenario. This means the art, story/dialogue, and what is done to the player is all up to you! Let your imagination go wild! (Within reason of course.) and ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS up to LoreKeeper Level!

Evil's Mastermind Level: Ever wanted to be the main villain in a game? Here you go! We will work with you to make whatever kind of villain you want to be the leader and manipulator of all the evil forces invading the world. Evil Hamster. Dark Overlord. Necromancer. Little Susie. Anything you can think of can be the guy/girl behind everything our hero is fighting against. (Again within reason.) and ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS up to LoreKeeper Level!

Wizard Level: Looking far and wide you cannot find any type of magic you cannot control, but there is still one to master. The infamous..... Ipod Touch. By pledging this level you will receive a limited edition Dungeons and Butter Goblins Ipod Touch (32GB.) It will be engraved with the logo on the back as well it will be loaded with the game (of course), pictures from developement, screenshots of everything that is being worked on, exclusive images as well as backgrounds, and funny notes that we will personally write. Also you will get to choose the color of the Ipod.

Arch-Mage Level: Looking further and wider you cannot find any type of magic you cannot control, but there is still one more to master. The infamous..... Ipad Mini. By pledging this level you will receive a limited edition Dungeons and Butter Goblins Ipad Mini (16GB.) It will be engraved with the logo on the back as well it will be loaded with the game (of course), pictures from developement, screenshots of everything that is being worked on, exclusive images as well as backgrounds, and funny notes that we will personally write. Also you will get to choose the color of the Ipad mini.

Diplomat Level: Like to meet new people? By pledging this level we will fly you out to meet us and have lunch with us. Talk about the game, chit-chat, and such. With this level you will also get the Dungeon Master level and we can talk with you directly about how you want us to make your dungeon. (DISCLAIMER: Within U.S. only. We will pay for the ticket round trip and take you out to eat, but hotel and all other meals are not provided plan accordingly.)

Master Level: You just broke the bank or robbed one :P Anyway you are as the title says the Master. The game is now under your dominion. Now that the game is yours what do you want to do with it? We will work with you to make the game how you want it. Story. Combat. Dungeons. Monsters. Funny Puns. They are all within your reach just say the word and we will try to make it happen. You will also get all the monster miniatures and of course the signed KickStarter Monster sheet. One more bonus will be our artist working with you to make a large scale painting of your choice of any monster in game (this will mean all the current and being worked on monsters from the other tiers.) You are the best person ever because you alone completely funded the project therefore you will get this no matter what! (LONG DISCLAIMER: The game or rights to it are not actually yours we still own them. All suggestions must be weighed by us but we will try to make it as much like what you want. Some systems are already very defined meaning we cannot change them. Everything we put in the game must be appropriate and family friendly so please work with us.)
